Pre-Game Insights: Pandya resumes T20I captaincy as New Zealand seek first win of tour
Gill and Kishan are set to open for India, as Shaw bides his time and Gaikwad is ruled out of the series with a wrist injury
Umran Malik and Shivam Mavi will have another opportunity to build on their performances against Sri Lanka
New Zealand will look to bounce back in the T20Is after being whitewashed in the ODIs
Mitchell Santner will take over the captaincy from Tom Latham
Shubman Gill and Finn Allen are in the spotlight
Post-Match Reflections: India have won all three T20Is played in Ranchi so far
Mitchell Santner had a great performance in the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ranchi is a bowl-first venue, with chasing teams winning 16 of the 25 T20 games hosted here
The year 2022 was Santner's best in T20Is with both bat and ball
The probable lineups for both teams are provided
